<title level="1" right="Rules">[Low-Light Vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=2411)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 433 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A creature with low-light vision can see in [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=2403) as though it were [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=2402), so it ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) condition due to dim light.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
